cause.description:
"Definitely not church as normal", Christan Family Church South Florida
* I figured I should change the information for this cause so that it would match the mission of the church that receives donations and cause members.
1. Word of Faith - Confession
2. Speaking in Tongues
3. Health and Wealth
cause.mission: To raise up Christian Family church pastors- through faithful discipleship training in church doctrine.
cause.name: Christian Family Church
